remarks: Value of the map defined by ~ df-mapd at the span of a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2015.)
statement:
mapdsn3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdsn3.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdsn3.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdsn3.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdsn3.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
mapdsn3.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
mapdsn3.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapdsn3.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapdsn3.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
mapdsn3.p $e |- P = ( LSpan ` D ) $.
mapdsn3.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdsn3.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
mapdsn3.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
mapdsn3.e $e |- ( ph -> ( L ` G ) = ( O ` { X } ) ) $.
mapdsn3 $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) = ( P ` { G } ) ) $.
